name: Greater Subjective Slam
text: Your gravitational impact is meteoric, and your ability to use the act of falling devastating.
prerequisites: Con 15; Wis 15; Subjective Mobility; Subjective Slam; base attack bonus +8 or monk level 7th.
benefit: When using Subjective Slam, you take only a â€“1 penalty on the combat maneuver check for every 100 feet of falling speed, and the maximum damage for such a slam increases to 12d6.
